TitleEnglish: The Journal of the Mysterious Creatures
SummaryEnglish: As a person who is down-to-earth as well as a good Samaritan, Hao Ren desires to live the rest of his life as a benevolent landlord. Stumbling into a curious yet mysterious lady, he began his journey of “collecting” abnormal and supernatural tenants. His life only became more chaotic when he receives a labor contract from “God”. Discover the many races, myths and worlds that lie beyond what humans define as normal! This bizarre fantasy full of fun is sure to bring you on a crazy rollercoaster of emotions! (Source: Novel Updates)
SummaryJapanese:
無職で彼女もいないごく普通の青年・好人（ヨシヒト）は、自分が住んでいる一軒家の空き部屋を貸すことで生計を立てていた。

彼は仕事探し中にちょっぴりおバカなおてんば娘・劉莉莉と出会う。彼女が家を探していることがわかると、さっそく好人は莉莉に空き部屋を紹介。お部屋を案内していると、２人は突如現れた吸血鬼・ヴィヴィアンに襲撃される。さらに莉莉は人狼へと変身･･････気が付くと異常生物たちとの謎の共同生活が開始していたのだった。

ひと癖やふた癖もある異常生物の入居者たちとともに、異世界と現世を行き交ってはさまざまな異文明に遭遇し、挙げ句の果てには宇宙にまつわる謎にまで直面することとなり･･････。

果たして、好人は次から次へと発生する無理難解な事件に立ち向かうことができるのか！
Aliases: Yì Cháng Shēng Wù Jiàn Wén Lù

1.TitleEnglish: It is the Blood-Sect & This Blood-Sect is not afraid of Garlic

2.TitleEnglish: My poverty is due to the will of the grand universe & God's Lunch

3.TitleEnglish: Powering Up For the First Time & East or west, home is the Best!

4.TitleEnglish: All language master & I'm Nangong. What can I do for you

5.TitleEnglish: Clash of biological clocks & Dog's Fortune

7.TitleEnglish: Already reminded before & No secret collections at all

8.TitleEnglish: It's just beside you & High End Technology

10.TitleEnglish: The Moon on the 15th of Lunar Months & Self-discipline of Villains

11.TitleEnglish: Not a kidnap & I have beaten your ancestors

12.TitleEnglish: I am the Main Tank & Windmill

1.SummaryEnglish: Yoshihito, an ordinary young man, is looking for a job to stabilize his life, and is trying to make a living by renting out a room in the house that his parents left him. With no resident and no hope of earning rent, he comes across a girl on the street who happens to be asking for directions...
1.SummaryJapanese:
絶賛就職活動中の若者・好人（ヨシヒト）。
彼は両親が残してくれた家の部屋を貸し出し、家賃収入で生計を立てようと考えるが、未だ入居者ゼロ。
そんな中、偶然街で道を尋ねてきた女の子が入居を希望してきたが･･････。

2.SummaryEnglish: After a long period of zero occupancy, his rented room finally has two girls moving in at once.One was a werewolf and one was a vampire.With him and other species, a strange shared life began.
2.SummaryJapanese:
空き部屋だった好人の家に突如、人狼と吸血鬼の女の子が入居することになった。
異種族との共同生活がスタートした矢先、ある企業に呼び出された好人。
指定された場所に赴いてみると･･････。

3.TitleEnglish: A New Friend to Quarrel With
3.SummaryEnglish: Yoshihito finds a job and starts his life as a judge and landlord at the same time. One day, while having dinner with the residents, he is suddenly called by his employer. When he rushes to the place, he is suddenly subjected to body modification!
3.SummaryJapanese:
職も決まり、大家との掛け持ち生活をスタートさせた好人。
ラッキー続きで浮かれている彼に，就職先からの予想もしない指示が。
上司の命令で人体改造されることになった好人が目覚めると･･････。

4.SummaryEnglish: Returning from the dimensional world of dreams, Yoshihito's next mission is to find a new resident. He took Riri and Vivian and left for England in order to accomplish his duty as an examiner.
4.SummaryJapanese:
夢の次元界から帰還した好人に与えられた次の仕事は、”3番目の入居者”をヨーロッパへ迎えに行くこと。
さっそく莉莉とヴィヴィアンとともに、イングランドへ旅立った好人だったが･･････。

5.TitleEnglish: The Ghost in the Old Castle - Part 1
5.SummaryEnglish: They came to England looking for a new resident. Information from the data source shows that the new resident is in Yafhrud. On their way, they meet the self-proclaimed demon hunter 'Nangoo Sanpachi' and together they head to Yafhrud Castle, where there are rumors of ghosts.
5.SummaryJapanese:
イングランドに渡った好人たちは、自称「魔狩人」こと南宮三八と出会う。
”3番目の入居者”がいるというヤフルド城ではその頃、幽霊騒ぎが起きていた･･････。

6.TitleEnglish: The Ghost in the Old Castle - Part 2
6.SummaryEnglish: They came to Yafhrud Castle where all ghost issues are taking place. They walk into the castle's basement to encounter whether a new resident or an evil ghost...?
6.SummaryJapanese:
幽霊騒ぎの渦中にあるヤフルド城へとやってきた好人たちは、城の地下へ歩みを進める。
果たしてそこで待ち受ける者は”3番目の入居者”か、それとも･･････。

7.SummaryEnglish: The seal of the demon was waiting for them when they reach the basement of Yafhrud Castle. They were mistaken as intruders who had come to break the demon's seal and now forced to fight with the defense system.
7.SummaryJapanese:
ヤフルド城地下で待ち受けていたのは、”3番目の入居者”ではなく悪魔の封印であった。
好人たちは封印を解く侵入者と判断され、防衛システムと戦闘することになってしまう･･････。

8.SummaryEnglish: The new resident they met at Yafhrud Castle was Isaccs, the demon. When he returns to their home after a few days, Raven calls him back and introduces him to the new resident, "Satsuki".Together with May, Yoshihito and the others head off to outer space to meet the next resident!
8.SummaryJapanese:
ヤフルド城で出会った悪魔のイザックス。
彼を連れて家に戻った好人だったが、またもワタリガラスに呼び出される。
4番目の入居者となった五月とともに、好人は5番目の入居者を迎えに行く任務を言い渡されるが･･････。

9.SummaryEnglish: The new resident seems to be on a planet 895 light years away from Earth. The trouble occurs during their way on their spaceship. The ship crashes on the target planet. When Yoshihito wakes up to find himself in the dimensional world of his dreams, a place he has been before.
9.SummaryJapanese:
地球から遠く離れた惑星にいる５番目の入居者を迎えに行った好人たち。
目的地に向けて小型艇に乗り換えた彼らだったが、トラブルで惑星の海に墜落してしまう。
気を失った好人が目覚めると、そこは以前にも来たことがある夢の次元界だった。

10.SummaryEnglish: The new resident was a mermaid's egg. Yoshihito took everyone and return to Earth on their spaceship "Dunkei Rockets". Just when he thought he had arrived safely and accomplished his mission, Riri suddenly went out of control. They decided to look for a way to bring back her consciousness.
10.SummaryJapanese:
５番目の入居者となる”人魚の卵”と、宇宙船「鈍亀岩盤号」を手に入れた好人。
彼らが地球に戻ると莉莉が謎の暴走状態になっていた。
ワタリガラスのもとに莉莉を連れていく好人一行だったが、果たして彼女を元に戻す手段はあるのだろうか･･････。

11.SummaryEnglish: Yoshihito and his friends brought Riri back to conscious from her atavismus. Although they returned home safely, soon they've been attacked by someone and Riri has been kidnapped. They use Vivien's bats to rescue her...
11.SummaryJapanese:
先祖返りを起こして暴走状態になった莉莉を、なんとか正気に戻した好人たち。
家に戻った矢先、好人は何者かに襲われ、気を失った隙に莉莉を拉致されてしまう。
ヴィヴィアンによって莉莉の居どころを突き止めることができたが･･････。

12.SummaryEnglish: It was the werewolves who had abducted Riri. They were told that the day of Siren's prophecy day was approaching, and various races were gathering their friends before then.A group of demon hunters starts to attacked Yoshihito and his friends now knowing what's going on.
12.TitleJapanese: いいひとになりなさい
12.SummaryJapanese:
莉莉を拉致した人狼たちと、なんとか話し合いができるようになった好人たち。
話によると、とあるセイレーンの言う予言の日が近づいており、人狼たちは異類の仲間を集めているのだという。
そんな中、魔狩人の集団が攻撃を仕掛けてくるのだった･･････。

13.SummaryEnglish: A group of demon hunters attacks them as they realized the gathering of various species. During the fierce battle, Satsuki is taken hostage by the demon hunter. However, when the self-proclaimed strongest demon hunter, Nangoo Sampachi appears, they are in an unexpected situation...!
13.TitleJapanese: 光熱費を払った後はゆで卵
13.SummaryJapanese:
セイレーンの予言を信じ、来たる日のために異類の戦力を集めようとしている人狼たち。
それを察知した魔狩人の集団に襲撃を受け、交戦する好人と人狼たちだったが、今度は五月が魔狩人の人質にされてしまう。
そこに自称最強の魔狩人こと南宮三八が現れ、事態は思わぬ方向に！？
